title: Black bean and couscous salad
ingredients: ['280ml (10 fl oz) chicken stock', '175g (6 oz) uncooked couscous', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', '2 tablespoons fresh lime juice', '1 teaspoon red wine vinegar', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '8 spring onions, chopped', '1 red pepper, seeded and chopped', 'small bunch fresh coriander, chopped', '175g (6 oz) frozen sweetcorn, thawed', '2 (400g) tins black beans, drained', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
